text: Nakayama Zenye (中山 善衞, July 7, 1932 – June 24, 2014) was the third Shinbashira of Tenrikyo. He was the first son of Nakayama Shōzen, the second Shinbashira, and the great-great-grandson of Nakayama Miki, the foundress of Tenrikyo. He held the office from November 14, 1967 until April 26, 1998. ==Further reading== * Category:Tenrikyo Category:Japanese religious leaders Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Nakayama Zenye
